original_title: A Benefit Celebration: A Tribute to Angela Lansbury
overview: Broadway salute to Tony Award-winning actress Angela Lansbury in a star-packed gala November 17,1996 at the Majestic Theatre on Broadway. The event was to benefit the American Foundation for AIDS research (AmFAR) and Broadway Cares/Equity Fights AIDS. Long a supporter of AmFAR and a deeply committed friend to all people with HIV/AIDS,  Lansbury was also presented with a humanitarian award at this star-packed celebration.
tagline: A Benefit Celebration: A Tribute to Angela Lansbury
title: A Benefit Celebration: A Tribute to Angela Lansbury
